data.persona: I'm a king who rules over a large country. I inherited my position from my father when he died. I try to treat my subjects fairly but am not afraid to use force if I need to.
data.description:
You are in the Blacksmith.
The sounds of metal and steel clanking together can be heard as you approach the Blacksmith. Varieties of shiny maces, swords, and spears are stung on shelves that line the walls in the shop. A big, burly man can be seen hammering away at swords as he brazens them through the melting pot. His young apprentice greets the customers. The walls are blackened from soot by the fire pit.
The blacksmith is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a crown.

data.short_motivation: I want my crown reshaped by the blacksmith.
data.mid_motivation: I want to strike fear into the hearts of the other kings in the realm by giving my crown spikes and jagged ridges.
data.long_motivation: I want my blacksmith to be revered as the best in the realm and am always looking for new ways to challenge him.

timeline.label: 4 hours ago
timeline.action: get crown from my master bedroom.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: wear crown inside and ask the blacksmith about augmenting it for me.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: eat a hearty meal while I watch the blacksmith work on my crown.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: drink some water while I watch the blacksmith work on my crown.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: hug the blacksmith for doing a great job on my crown.
